quest.name: Clean Times
journal:
With great popularity comes great filth, as Managingway well knows.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Speak with the cleanly Loporrit in Greatest Endsvale.
Deliver the requested items to Managingway.
objectives: Speak with the cleanly Loporrit in Greatest Endsvale.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: In no small part due to your efforts, many Ways have begun frequenting the Dreaming Workshop. And while this is a pleasing development, the increase in traffic has led to more filth, which our cleaners struggle to deal with.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: I raised the matter with Inventingway, who has agreed to upgrade the cleaner machina. He simply requires some components, which I would like you to supply.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: You recall the cleaner, yes? Inventingway believes there's room to upgrade it further, and it would be remiss of us to ignore this opportunity to further improve operational efficiency. To wit, I'd like you to supply the necessary components once more.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: If you would take yourself to Greatest Endsvale, my cleanly colleague there will furnish you with the requisite materials. Many thanks in advance!

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04695
dialogue.text: I'm a lean, mean, cleaning machine! ...Actually, that's the machine over there─and we're going to upgrade it, you say!? Music to my ears!

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04695
dialogue.text: Here, please use these materials to craft a component for enhancing the drivetrain.

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04695
dialogue.text: Here, please use these materials to craft a component for enhancing the polishing attachment.

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04695
dialogue.text: Here, please use these materials to craft a component for enhancing the power supply.

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04695
dialogue.text: Managingway will take it off your hands when it's ready. And if you require more materials, just let me know!

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04695
dialogue.text: Hello again! Need more materials, do you? ...Ah no, you still have some.

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04695
dialogue.text: Hello again! Need more materials, do you? ...Ah no, you still have some.

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04695
dialogue.text: Hello again! Need more materials, do you? ...Ah no, you still have some.

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04695
dialogue.text: Hello again! Need more materials, do you? Here you go, then!

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04695
dialogue.text: Hello again! Need more materials, do you? Here you go, then!

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04695
dialogue.text: Hello again! Need more materials, do you? Here you go, then!

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Do you perchance have a cleaner component for me?

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Much obliged! I will deliver this to Inventingway at once!

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Though our friend tends to come up with nonsensical inventions, with appropriate management, he also produces highly useful ones. I shall do my best to steer his genius in the right direction!
